title: Attribute Methods Exercise
description: Practice using attr_reader, attr_writer, and attr_accessor to create proper object interfaces
hints: Use attr_reader for attributes that should only be readable from outside the class
Use attr_writer for attributes that need validation or processing when set
Use attr_accessor for simple read-write attributes that don't need special logic
For boolean attributes, consider adding a ? to the reader method name
Custom setters should validate input and raise errors for invalid values
Remember that attr_writer creates a method ending with =
